## 连续型变量

### 描述性统计分析

```{r echo=FALSE}
ContinuousSummary(x)
```

### 图像分析

```{r histogram_continuous, echo=FALSE}
  if (graph_type == "histogram") {
    plot <- ContinuousHisto(x,binwidth,...)
    
  } else if (graph_type == "boxplot") {
    plot <- ContinuousBox(x,...)
    
  } else if (graph_type == "all") {
    ContinuousBox(x,...)
    ContinuousHisto(x,binwidth,...)
  }

```

### Chi,t检验
``` {r chisq, echo=FALSE}
ContinuousTests(x)
```
